name: Fluffy and Crispy Waffles
directions: Sift flour, baking powder, and salt into a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk egg yolks and sugar until pale and smooth.
Add milk, melted butter, and vanilla; whisk to combine.
Add dry ingredients and whisk until just blended; do not overmix.
In a separate bowl, beat egg whites to soft peaks, then gently fold into batter.
Coat waffle iron with nonstick spray and pour in enough batter to cover the grid.
Cook until golden brown, about 2â€“3 minutes, or as directed by your waffle iron.
Repeat with remaining batter and serve warm.
